sentence:
Mr. WELCH.  Res. 224; further, that the resolution be  agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, and the motions to reconsider be  considered made and laid upon the table.

Mr. WELCH. Mr. President, I strongly support this resolution.

I do want to say thank you to Senator Kaine.

Senator Kaine, I think I speak for you and I think I speak for every  Member…

There's no reason for us to be building brand-new nuclear       weapons.…
